H0.text: Which ‘P’ shot the arrow that killed Achilles by striking him on his heel. Perseus

H1.text: Which ‘P’ shot the arrow that killed Achilles by striking him on his heel. Philoctetes

H2.text: Which ‘P’ shot the arrow that killed Achilles by striking him on his heel. Phaedon

H3.text: Which ‘P’ shot the arrow that killed Achilles by striking him on his heel. PARIS

A4.text: Achilles dies by an arrow of Paris with Apollo's help.
